subject: Boats and Boating
Records and Achievements
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: The 1986 voyage — which lasted 150 days 1 hour 6 minutes — shattered the previous record of 292 days set by a British sailor.
snippet: The 1986 voyage — which lasted 150 days 1 hour 6 minutes — shattered the previous record of 292 days set by a British sailor.
